BOARD.desc_controll_mode_pin: Setting GPIO pin that will change from keystroke mode to storage mode as example pin 2, 6, 10, 13...
BOARD.desc_enable_auto_switch_mode: switch attack mode without  need to replug usb
BOARD.desc_enable_auto_reload: when editing a file in PICO and saving it, it will auto reboot PICO

AP.desc_channel: You can set random channel  value by using RANDOM or specify channel value as int in range [1,13]
AP.desc_ports: at least you should put 2 ports, other ports are used in emergency
